author: Special Correspondent
text: Nine members of the Thanthai Periyar Dravidar Kazhagam were arrested after they attempted to picket the Passport Office here on Monday demanding 27 per cent reservation for the backward classes in employment in central government offices as per the recommendation of the Mandal Commission. The members assembled near the spot to indulge in the agitation when they were prevented by the police and arrested. They were led by the outfit’s district president Jagannathan. Those held were later released.
title: TPDK members arrested
